member.name: M:CCT_App.Controllers.Api.RolesController.GetRoles
member.summary: Get all the roles a person may have within an activity
member.returns: A list of all the roles and their coresponding acronyms
member.remarks: Queries the database for all the roles that are valid

member.summary: Get a single role and the information about it
member.param: The identifier for a single role
member.returns: The information about the specified role
member.remarks: Queries the database and returns information about one particular role

member.name: M:CCT_App.Controllers.Api.SessionsController.GetCM_SESSION_MSTR
member.summary: Get a list of all sessions

member.remarks: Queries the database for all sessions, current and past

member.summary: Get one specific session specified by the id in the URL string
member.param: The identifier for one specific session
member.returns: The information about one specific session
member.remarks: Queries the database regarding a specific session with the given identifier

member.name: M:CCT_App.Controllers.Api.SessionsController.GetActivitiesForSession(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the activities taking place during a given session
member.returns: A list of all activities that are active during the given session determined by the id parameter
member.remarks: Queries the database to find which activities are active during the session desired

member.name: M:CCT_App.Controllers.Api.StudentsController.GetStudents
member.summary: Get a list of all students in the database
member.returns: A list of student names, IDs, and emails
member.remarks: Queries the database for every student record within the student table

member.name: M:CCT_App.Controllers.Api.StudentsController.GetStudent(System.String)
member.summary: Get information about a single student
member.param: The Gordon ID of desired student
member.returns: The information about the specified student
member.remarks: Queries the database for the specific student identified by their Gordon ID

member.name: M:CCT_App.Controllers.Api.StudentsController.GetActivitiesForStudent(System.String)
member.summary: Get any and all memberships that a specific student has been a part of

member.returns: The membership information that the student is a part of
member.remarks: Queries the database for membership information regarding the student id specified only

member.name: M:CCT_App.Controllers.Api.StudentsController.PutStudent(System.String,CCT_App.Models.Student)
member.summary: Update an existing student record
member.param: The ID of an existing student
The student object that will be changed
member.returns: The updated student object
member.remarks: Queries the database to edit the values of one row

member.name: M:CCT_App.Controllers.Api.StudentsController.PostStudent(CCT_App.Models.Student)
member.summary: Add a new student

member.returns: The student information that was added
member.remarks: Queries the database to add a new student

member.name: M:CCT_App.Controllers.Api.StudentsController.DeleteStudent(System.String)
member.summary: Delete an existing student record
member.param: The student ID for the student being removed
member.returns: The student information that was removed
member.remarks: Queries the database to remove the row in the students table with the same ID as the one from the URL string

member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:CCT_App.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.
